title: Sum Array Elements
prompt: Calculate the sum of all numbers in an array using assembly language.

signature.asm:
; Input: Array at memory location 0x1000, length in R0
; Output: Sum in R0

starter.asm:
.ORG 0x0000
.DATA
array: .WORD 1, 2, 3, 4, 5
length: .WORD 5

.TEXT
start:
    MOV R0, length
    MOV R1, #0      ; sum
    MOV R2, #array  ; pointer
    ; TODO: Implement sum loop
    HLT

explain: Use loop with pointer arithmetic and accumulator register.
